painting.name: An Askew Painting
painting.text: You are standing in the stairwell of The Satanic Temple’s art gallery.  Art galore decorates the rich wallpaper.  One of the paintings is slightly askew.

catacombs.name: An Unpredictable Stair
catacombs.text: You reach out and right the painting.  An unsettling ratcheting sound echoes in the wall and suddenly the stair you are standing on trundles aside. You tumble into a slide that carries you through cold, dark air, bumping and thumping as you round awkward turns, until it dumps you into a subterranean chamber. A fortune telling machine sits ominously in the center of the rock-hewn floor, and on the machine is a button. There is also a door to your right.

fortune.name: Fortune
fortune.text: The machine whirs and rumbles to life. Eyes flashing, the fortune teller says in a lilting Indian accent, ”My name is Madame la Vache. I sense the presence of someone seeking knowledge.  I will now divine your future!“ A card pokes out from a slot below the machine and her eyes grow dim once again. She lurches back into an awkward pose and is silent.

card.name: The Card
card.text: For possibly the first time, divination has correctly told you something true.  The card reads, ”You are going to die someday.“

returnCard.name: The Card Return
returnCard.text: You place the card back into the slot on the fortune telling machine and it disappears back into the mechanism.  Silence fills the room for a few seconds, then sudden there is a resounding ‘clunk’ of internal mechanisms in the wall.  It opens, revealing a door to your left.
